Title: Enacts the "pediatric cancer neuropsychological needs assessment act"
Summary: Enacts the "pediatric cancer neuropsychological needs assessment act"; requires insurers to provide coverage for neuropsychological assessments for children with pediatric cancers which affect brain development or function.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to requiring certain insurance policies to provide coverage for neuropsychological exams for children with pediatric cancers which affect brain development or function
